name: Panda Math
description:
The purpose of the game is to help primary school children master basic maths. This topic was chosen because a lot of research has shown that mental arithmetic is a big problem among younger learners.

The positive features of my game include:

- Mental arithmetic becomes more difficult as the learner progresses;

- The game is colourful and keeps the learner's attention using the colour;

- Learners are remunerated through the allocation of marks;

- The main account sums are never the same.

Modding is supported!!!

You can edit the images of the game as you like, zip them into a folder and publish it as a mod.

If you screw up and did not make a back up copy, you can download the official Restoration pack with all the back up images you need for the game

Important note!

This was my school project for the year so do not expect anything amazing, but you probably won't. I do think this game helps with math problems.
